characters.name: Daniel
characters.summary: Exiled Jewish prophet and wise man in Babylon who remained faithful to God, interpreted dreams and visions, and received apocalyptic revelations about kingdoms and the Son of Man.

pages.title: Hub Overview
pages.description: Multi-page hub with book architecture, navigation, and study pathways

pages.title: Faithful Exile
pages.description: Court narratives, New Adam theology, third way of faithful presence in Babylon

pages.title: Son of Man
pages.description: Four beasts, Ancient of Days, the vision that shaped Jesus' identity

pages.title: Prophetic Hope
pages.description: Seventy sevens, Jubilee math, Second Temple interpretation, resurrection hope

characters.name: Hananiah (Shadrach)
characters.summary: One of Daniel's three faithful companions who refused to worship Nebuchadnezzar's golden image and survived the fiery furnace.

characters.name: Mishael (Meshach)
characters.meaning: Who is what God is? / (Babylonian: uncertain)
characters.summary: One of Daniel's three faithful companions who refused to worship Nebuchadnezzar's golden image and survived the fiery furnace.

characters.name: Azariah (Abednego)
characters.meaning: Yahweh has helped / Servant of Nebo
characters.summary: One of Daniel's three faithful companions who refused to worship Nebuchadnezzar's golden image and survived the fiery furnace.

characters.name: Nebuchadnezzar
characters.summary: King of Babylon who conquered Jerusalem, experienced humbling and restoration after becoming beast-like, eventually acknowledged God's sovereignty.

characters.name: Belshazzar
characters.summary: Last Babylonian king who desecrated temple vessels at his feast, saw the writing on the wall, and was killed the night Babylon fell.

characters.name: Darius the Mede
characters.summary: Medo-Persian ruler under whom Daniel served and was thrown into the lions' den due to a conspiracy by jealous officials.

characters.name: Cyrus
characters.summary: Persian king who conquered Babylon and allowed the Jews to return from exile.

characters.name: Gabriel
characters.summary: Angelic messenger who explained Daniel's visions, particularly the seventy sevens prophecy.

characters.name: Michael
characters.summary: Angelic prince and protector of Israel, engaged in spiritual warfare, defender of God's people in the final conflict.
